qa.question: Main Phone Use
qa.answer: GPS navigation, YouTube for news/songs, WhatsApp for customers, UPI payments.

qa.question: Phone Sharing
qa.answer: No, keep phone private due to income/ride info.

qa.question: Favorite Apps
qa.answer: Google Maps, WhatsApp, PhonePe. Unsure which permissions are needed.

qa.question: Permission Reading
qa.answer: Allow most, deny if suspicious (e.g., contacts in GPS app).

qa.question: App Trust
qa.answer: Trust Google apps, check YouTube reviews for others.

qa.question: Content Deletion
qa.answer: Clear WhatsApp chats and call logs sometimes.

qa.question: Phone Repair
qa.answer: Remove SIM, log out of UPI, delete gallery, worry about QR code misuse.

qa.question: Help with Problems
qa.answer: Try YouTube tutorials, ask brother if serious.

qa.question: Trusted People
qa.answer: Wife and brother, but don’t share passwords.

qa.question: Code Words
qa.answer: Save passengers as 'Uncle' or 'Customer1'.

qa.question: Helping Others
qa.answer: Helped auto driver install UPI, warned not to save PIN.

qa.question: Permission Control
qa.answer: Learned to stop apps using location always.

qa.question: Warning Messages
qa.answer: Search app name online or avoid.

qa.question: Access to Contacts/Photos
qa.answer: Think used for spam/ads, deny if unnecessary.

qa.question: Repair Hesitation
qa.answer: Yes, delete QR code/photos before repair.

qa.question: Repair Person Behavior
qa.answer: Saw repair guy take screenshot once.

qa.question: Password Use
qa.answer: Pattern lock + AppLock for PhonePe.

qa.question: Local vs International Apps
qa.answer: Prefer Indian apps for payments (BHIM).

qa.question: Tech Help
qa.answer: YouTube first, then brother.

qa.question: Social Influence
qa.answer: Auto driver group shares fraud/safety info.

scenarios.Broken Phone: Remove SIM, delete QR code, uninstall PhonePe before repair.
scenarios.Sharing with Family: Don’t share, keep locked after child deleted UPI screenshot.
scenarios.Installing New App: Check reviews, avoid if too many permissions, trust govt payment apps.
scenarios.Helping Elderly Relative: Installed WhatsApp for uncle, explained not to click links.
scenarios.Using Borrowed Phone: Use only for needed task, lock if private message pops up.
scenarios.Giving Away Phone: Reset completely, remove Google account before handing over.
scenarios.Cloud Backup Surprise: Deleted photos stayed in Google Drive, now use delete everywhere.
scenarios.Free Public WiFi: Use only in emergencies, avoid banking, wait for mobile data.
scenarios.Lottery Call: Caller claimed prize, blocked number, warned group.
scenarios.Emergency Transfer: Confirm with call, avoid suspicious requests.
